description: This file contains utility functions for serializing and deserializing Open vSwitch (OVS) set data structures to and from JSON. It includes generic handlers for OVS sets, as well as specific handlers for integer, boolean, real (double), string, and UUID sets. The functions facilitate conversion between internal data representations and JSON format used in network communication or configuration.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_from_json(pjs_type_from_json_t * t_from_json,void * t_data,int out_max,int * out_len,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Generic function to parse an OVS set from JSON, calling the provided type-specific callback for each element. Handles JSON arrays formatted as OVS sets, including special handling for missing optional fields and internal types.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_to_json(pjs_type_to_json_t * in_cb,void * in_data,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Generic function to serialize a data set into JSON format as per OVS conventions, optionally wrapping a single element as a simple value.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_int_from_json(int * out,int out_max,int * out_num,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Deserializes a set of integers from JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_int_to_json(int * in_data,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a set of integers into JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_bool_from_json(bool * out,int out_max,int * out_num,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Deserializes a set of boolean values from JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_bool_to_json(bool * in_data,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a set of boolean values into JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_real_from_json(double * out,int out_max,int * out_num,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Deserializes a set of doubles (real numbers) from JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_real_to_json(double * in_data,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a set of doubles (real numbers) into JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_string_from_json(char * out,size_t out_sz,int out_max,int * out_num,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Deserializes a set of strings from JSON into a character buffer with size limitations.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_string_to_json(char * in_data,size_t in_sz,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a set of strings from a buffer into JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_uuid_from_json(ovs_uuid_t * out,int out_max,int * out_num,bool * present,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Deserializes a set of UUIDs from JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_ovs_set_uuid_to_json(ovs_uuid_t * in_data,int in_len,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a set of UUIDs into JSON.
